text: Antón García Abril OAXS (19 May 1933 – 17 March 2021) was a Spanish composer and musician. He composed the music for Amando de Ossorio's Blind Dead movie series, being Tombs of the Blind Dead (1972), Return of the Blind Dead (1973), The Ghost Galleon (1974) and Night of the Seagulls (1975). ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish composers Category:Spanish musicians
title: Antón García Abril
